meanings.sent1: My friend is one of the recommenders for good movies to watch.
meanings.sent2: The recommenders at the bookstore always have great book suggestions.
meanings.sent3: The recommenders at the restaurant were so insistent on trying the spicy dish.
meanings.sent4: She was like a walking recommender, always pointing out the best deals.
meanings.sent5: The recommenders in the group chat made choosing a restaurant so much easier.

meanings.definition: A software tool that suggests or recommends items based on user preferences.
meanings.sent1: The online store's recommender helped me find the perfect gift.
meanings.sent2: I rely on the recommender feature to discover new music I might like.
meanings.sent3: The recommender algorithm surprised me with its quirky suggestions.
meanings.sent4: The recommender function acted like a personal shopper, picking out ideal outfits.
meanings.sent5: The recommender on the website made shopping for books a breeze.
